author: BBC News
content: A World War One-era German hand grenade has been found among a delivery of potatoes shipped from France to a crisp factory in Hong Kong.
description: The device was found among a delivery of potatoes from France sent to a crisp factory in Hong Kong.
name: BBC News
title: WW1 grenade found in potato shipment

author: BBC News
content: Australia says the last four migrant children detained at a camp on the Pacific island of Nauru are being moved to the US
description: Australia says the four children and their families held on the Pacific island are going to the US.
name: BBC News
title: Last children leave Nauru migrant camp

author: BBC News
content: Pay for workers in their 30s is still 7% below the level at which it peaked before the 2008 banking crisis, research has suggested
description: Analysis suggests workers in their 30s have been hardest hit by the effects of the 2008 financial crisis.
name: BBC News
title: Millennials' pay 'scarred' by bank crisis

author: BBC News
content: Theresa May has said she is determined to deliver Brexit
description: The PM says she's returning to Brussels with a 'fresh mandate' to renegotiate her deal with the EU.
name: BBC News
title: May 'determined' to deliver Brexit on time
